author: Jake Baldino
description:
Halo is back with an Unreal Engine 5 remake of the original game. Halo Campaign Evolved marks the next move for Halo Studios...and it's coming to PS5. Let's talk about how wild that is.

~~

title: They're remaking Halo (again)
